Roma in Mostra
  • homeHome
  • collectionsMostre
  • addAggiungi mostra
  • personLogin
  • contactsContattaci
    • Profilo Logout
import { Component, DoCheck} from '@angular/core'; import { AuthService } from 'src/app/service/auth.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements DoCheck{ user: any; constructor( private router: Router, public authService: AuthService, ){} ngDoCheck(): void { if(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) !== null){ this.user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')); } } logout(){ this.authService.logout(); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
